title: Free mystery gift
body: Just wondering, if it's possible to get the anniversary mystery gift (as I already own riot kayle) right away once I send a support ticket tomorrow :S  I don't think I'm gonna get it till tomorrow so yeah... sorry if I'm annoying and I ask stupid question or it was answered before a million times already.

replies.body: Those who already have Riot Kayle will receive a mystery gift instead per the [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you).  Gifts are not done being sent out, so stay updated in our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hang tight!
